Text: WHY SO FUCKING LARGE?? PUT IN VIDEO FILES ONLY YOU JEW!
If you don't want this in HD, go away.  That's why it's so large.
ARE ALL EPISODES JUST IN 4 VIDEOS??? PLS ANSWER ME HOW TO WATCH ALL THOSE THINGS AS ONE...

I registered just to say thank you DF, this is an awesome job, and I can only hope that I am able to finish downloading it while there is still seeders. For those bitching about how big this is, these are quite possible the best movie(s) ever made, with part I being out 40 years. So what, it will take a little longer to download, but I am sure we will be watching this version probably 10 years from now if we are still alive.
